__e: Why don't you spend Thanksgiving with her, and I'll go to your house and screw your wife?
And if he can get a reprieve on Thanksgiving, why can't I?
Why don't you spend Thanksgiving with her, and I'll go to your house and screw your wife?
And if he can get a reprieve on Thanksgiving, why can't I?
Well... if it's action you crave...
This just isn't the type of action I was thinking of...
'Tis a far, far better thing I do than I have ever done before.
How would you like to perform a righteous act and make me a happy man?
Give me a little girl-On-Wass action, and that cash is mine.
So I'm the one who does the good deed, and that guy goes off with the girl?
This action is what I need to feel like a man.
Because for you the story is more important than the music?
All right, before you file a lawsuit or decide to just be happy that you'll be okay, can I talk to you about something else?
- I heard about the lawsuit and decided to become a part of it because I never wanted another woman to go through what I went through.
Why take a gamble with the lawsuit when all the money you need is right here?
No, that's only the action of what he does.
Well, I guess I've done my good deed for the day.
Are you sure you want this to be your first act as... - boss for the day ?
